title: Orin 399
summary: The Orin 399 is a tier 3 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It is the most advanced version of the Orin pistol weapon line and is is considered as a less accurate/higher damage counterpart of the Hyper line.
full_text:
Orin 399
The Orin 399 is a tier 3 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It is the most advanced version of the Orin pistol weapon line and is is considered as a less accurate/higher damage counterpart of the Hyper line.
